extendedInfo.description: Enjoy anytime, anywhere mobile access to XFINITYÂ®Home, your total home security and home control solution.  The XFINITYâ¢ Home app provides remote security monitoring, device control and event history.  You can see your kids get home from school, turn on your lights before you walk in the door and even adjust your thermostat â all from your mobile device.NOTE: Available in most Comcast markets, except for Houston customers who purchased services prior to 11/16/11.Key Mobile App FeaturesFor those with XFINITY Home Secure service:â¢	Access to lights, door/window sensors, motion sensors, cameras, thermostats and event historyâ¢	Remote video monitoringâ¢	Remote arm & disarmFor those with XFINITY Home Control service:â¢	Access to lights, door/window sensors, motion sensors, cameras, thermostats and event historyâ¢	Remote video monitoringâ¢	Remotely turn rules on/offDisclaimer: Not available in all areas. Restrictions apply. Service and equipment sold separately. Services and features vary based on service package.Requirements:  XFINITY Home subscription. Comcast ID and password. Android OS (2.2 and higher). Device: Motorola Droid Razr Maxx, Google Nexus (1, 7 or Prime), HTC One (X, S). Certified on Samsung Galaxy S III, Samsung Galaxy Tablet (7Â¨, 10Â¨) and Samsung Galaxy Tablet 2 (7Â¨, 10.1Â¨).

reviews.title: Connection error
reviews.comment: Only works when connected to wifi. Says connection error when on regular network. Has done this since the app has been out. DROID dna / galaxy note /galaxy s3 please fix. Useless
reviews.author: Justin Derench

reviews.title: Really should be zero star POOR SERVICE
reviews.comment: Never able to arm disarm or even log in to see the status of the system. I would not suggest the app or alarm system to anyone. When our two yrs are up they can have forget this mess is for the birds!!!!
reviews.author: Alecia Lee

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Should be 0 stars! Seldomly connects to the network. Thermostat rarely matches my actual thermostat. Cameras have never connected. Better off having my laptop nearby.
reviews.author: BabiBoi Shon

reviews.title: Connection \"always\" an issue!
reviews.comment: Crappy home system, horrible app. It\'s always has connection issues or invalid username/password no matter if it\'s the correct info. sometimes will say problems connecting with the server, the whole system is a problem!
reviews.author: chris angeles

reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.comment: Works great some days other days won\'t connect. Called xfinity and they told me to reinstall app which worked.
reviews.author: Daniel Barrows

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just got it installed, so freaking cool. Got the Home automation kit as well, perfect. Connectivity is flawless and reaction time is consistently under 2 seconds on 3/4 g/lte.  Get it!!
reviews.author: Matthew Miller

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me log in. Keep saying invalid username and password even though its not. tried uninstalling and installing again but it won\'t work
reviews.author: MzEisha93

reviews.title: Finally, Yay! It Works on Intuition by LG
reviews.comment: The recent update works flawlessly on my phone. The interface looks good and I now have total control. I can turn lights on /off, change the thermostat, view the cams, and set/disarm the alarm! The only drawback is the refresh rate on the cameras.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was working great..
reviews.comment: Now won\'t connect which is the reason I got this system so I could control remotely.
reviews.author: Jarett Bailey

reviews.title: Great app, needs features.
reviews.comment: The app works great for arming and disarming the system. Issues with sensors not reporting correct temperature values. Hardly a deal breaker. The alarm system is still new and I am sure in the next year or so many new features will be included in the app. Would love to have more control within the app itself. Seeing who armed and disarmed the system, change access codes, add or remove users and pin numbers. Looking forward to future app updates.
reviews.author: Joshua Heinaman

reviews.title: Getting better.
reviews.comment: I can\'t arm or disarm anymore.  I can only check the status.  I also tried it on my wife\'s iPhone and it doesn\'t work.  This is BS. I\'m locked I\'m for 3yrs of this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No video in app
reviews.comment: had this app for a while with no issues then all of a sudden video stops working comcast has no idea why I put in a complaint a long time ago and still haven\'t heard nothing about it
reviews.author: Scott Everett

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: New version fixed all the issues I had with the cameras freezing up and not displaying any picture. Loads much faster thank you for updating this app!  Please add the ability to modify rules on the app for Xfinity Secure. Secondly, the ability to take video clips and pictures similar to the website would be a plus. If someone is breaking into my home and I get a text notification it would be nice to monitor and record remotely at the same time.
reviews.author: Joseph Stone

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Can\'t arm or disarm 98% of time needs an update I have to wake up whole family just to get in my house.
reviews.author: Shawn Torres

reviews.title: Its work better now
reviews.comment: Works 10 % of the times u try to use the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Barely works
reviews.comment: Thanks for releasing another update which doesn\'t work. Constantly receive \"connection timeout\" so this app is useless.
reviews.author: Deanna Newcomb

reviews.title: Works well.
reviews.comment: I can enable or disable the alarm system on the fly without problem from my Samsung Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Douglas Brooks

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money.
reviews.comment: Just dropped my rating to a 1. When out for more than 7 days, I can\'t connect and change settings. Tried to turn my A/C on when heading home from vacation and got no response. This happens EVERYtime. Can\'t wait til my contract is up so I can get this POS system out and install a real alarm system.
reviews.author: Mark J Mager

reviews.title: If it works
reviews.comment: Connection error is a common issue here. Of course no services by comcast are guaranteed.  Works when it works. Needs work. Getting better.
reviews.author: Jeff Olson

reviews.comment: Works great no issues so far on my Samsung S4
reviews.author: Jon Jalbert
